name: Going Postbot
description:
You are the robot Postiebot who is tasked with transmitting the mail of the future. Unfortunately, the mail has been stolen by the box factory. Rescue the mail and do your duty.

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2018. It has bugs, which isn't surprising considering it was made at a game jam. They'll be fixed, in the future.

Controls:

Cursor keys to move left and right (or 'A' and 'D'), 'space bar' to jump, and 'ctrl' to pick up and put down boxes. Alternatively it works with a PS4 controller (d-pad to move left and right, X to jump, and square button to pick up and put down boxes).
